dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice]
dmca.body:
Please note that the website referenced in your DMCA notice does not
reside within our network as of 11:57:43 a.m. (GMT-6) on June 28, 2006.
 
Legal Response Team
The Planet

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Monday, June 26, 2006 1:15 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement
Notice]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement
Notice]




-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement
Notice
Date:         Sat, 24 Jun 2006 08:56:10 -0700 (PDT)
From:         Ron Wainscott <ron@ronwainscottphotography.com>
To:         info@synth-tec.com, support@synth-tec.com, abuse@theplanet.com
CC:         evils_bubbles@yahoo.com



Please find attached a formal DMCA notice in regards to a profile on
vampirefreaks.com using my copyrighted work without permission.
Immediate action is necessary to avoid criminal prosecution.  Ron
Wainscott Photography DOES NOT allow the use of our copyrighted images
without permission and will take whatever actions necessary to prosecute
those responsible for infringing upon our copyrights.

Ron Wainscott Photography
P.O. Box 4766
Gulf Shores, AL 36547
(251) 967-4226

Attached: 
I am writing to demand removal of the following vampirefreaks.com profile:
 
 http://vampirefreaks.com/u/geeky_lover
 
The images and videos being used on this profile are owned by me.  This person DID NOT obtain my permission to use them.  Therefore, this is a violation of the DMCA Act.  If you continues to allow this profile to stay up, I am prepared to file Copyright Infringment charges against the owners of vampirefreaks.com  If action is not taken by Monday June 26, 2006 legal action will be taken.  In addition, the model who is featured in the pictures and videos plans to file identity theft charges if action is not taken immediately
 

The content in question was illegally downloaded from http://www.dawnavril.com.  All material contained on dawnavril.com is owned by me and is not to be re-used or re-published without the express written consent of Ron Wainscott Photography.
 
The infringing material is located at:
 
http://vampirefreaks.com/u/geeky_lover
I am the rightful owner of the images and videos being used in the profile listed above.  You may contact me at:
 
Ron Wainscott Photography
 
P.O. Box 4766
 
Gulf Shores, AL 36547
 
(251) 967-4226
 
ron@ronwainscottphotography.com
 
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
 
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 
Ron Wainscott
 
(251) 967-4226
 
ron@ronwainscottphotography.com
